title: EXCLUSIONS
deductible: The amount of the Excess specified in th
sample_text:
This policy does not cover any Costs directly or indirectly 
caused by or arising out of
Asbestos
Asbestos or asbestos containing materials.
Breach of warranty
Any breach of warranty or any breach of guarantee of fitness 
for purpose whether written or implied when caused solely 
by such breach.
Carcinogens
Any accidental contamination arising out of carcinogens, 
regardless of whether such carcinogens are shown to have 
other non-carcinogenic effects.
Cross liabilities
The recovery, or attempted recovery, of Costs incurred by one 
Insured from another Insured.
